page.title: 17Education in Tenby area
page.content: Within our survey block there are no educational establishments.The children who live in this area have to travel 2 miles to school,whether it is Tenby or Saundersfoot.The pre_shool play group is the only thing catered for within the block,at New Hedges village Hall once a week.The other play groups run for children under 4 yrs are at the Tenby Further Education Centre.An english one and a welsh one. Nursery Education is catered for at Tenby,Heywood Lane,St Teilos Saundersfoot and Netherwood which is a private school,with termly fees. There is a choice of four Infant and Junior schools,Tenby,St.Teilos, Heywood Lane Infant school,Tenby C.P. school,Saundersfoot C.P. school and Netherwood.There is a Welsh Unit in Tenby Infant school with one to follow next year in Tenby C.P. school.
